menu

Customize

Mimity uses Yarn as package manager and Gulp for build tool

  • Make sure your machine has Yarn and Gulp installed
  • Navigate to the root mimity directory and run yarn install to install our local dependencies listed in package.json
  • When completed, youâ€™ll be able to run the following commands from the command line:
    • gulp watch will serve the template at 127.0.0.1:4441, open browser automatically, watch changes then reload the browser automatically
    • gulp will rebuild all plugins, css, and js then serve the template, open browser and watch changes same as gulp watch command
  • Please customize the file in the src folder
